simplified: 又想当婊子又想立牌坊

pronunciation.pinyin: yòu xiǎng dāng biǎo zi yòu xiǎng lì pái fāng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1

details.simplified: 又想当婊子又想立牌坊
details.traditional: 又想當婊子又想立牌坊

meanings.value: to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity
